FitDRoller.RollTokenDescription: Choose your dice pool. Choose your threat. Choose your effect.
FitDRoller.RollDoWithIncreasedEffect: You succeed and gain an extra benefit (increased effect, uncover a secret, improved position, pinpoint a bounty).
FitDRoller.RollDo: It goes as well as intended.
FitDRoller.RollPartial: You do it but it comes with a Consequence.
FitDRoller.RollFail: Things go bad and you suffer the Consequences.
FitDRoller.RollZeromode: Zero Dice rolled - rolling two dice and taking the lowest
FitDRoller.RollGreatEffectDescription: You get an exceptional result or an extreme effect.
FitDRoller.RollStandardEffectDescription: You get a good result or full effect.
FitDRoller.RollLimitedEffectDescription: You get a mixed result or a partial effect.
FitDRoller.RollPoorEffectDescription: You get a bad result or little effect.
FitDRoller.RollZeroEffectDescription: You get a terrible result or zero effect.
FitDRoller.RollExtremeEffectDescription: You get an exceptional result or an extreme effect.
FitDRoller.maxDiceCountHint: The maximum number of dice available in the popup
FitDRoller.defaultDiceCountName: Default Number of Dice to Roll
FitDRoller.defaultDiceCountHint: The number of dice that will start selected in the popup
FitDRoller.defaultPositionHint: The threat that will start selected in the popup
FitDRoller.defaultEffectHint: The effect that will start selected in the popup
FitDRoller.backgroundColorHint: The background color of the dice results in the chat messages
FitDRoller.newInterfaceHint: Use new GUI interface for roller
